forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this morning will become overcast during the afternoon. High 17C. ENE winds shifting to S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 63F. ENE winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 9C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 49F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 15C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 60F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain after midnight. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 17C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 64F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 64F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.
